features: Premium Knife Set with Block: The ultra-sharp kitchen knife sets adopt high-quality stainless steel, hand sharpened to an 18°degree angle per side, maintaining the perfect balance between blade sharpness and maximum resilience. The knife block is made of sturdy and durable solid wood, ventilation design at the bottom, and the wood grain is clear and beautiful.

High-quality Kitchen Knife Set: Each knife blade in this knife block set is made of premium imported steel from Japan, safe for dishwasher (will update the neutral manual). All the knives are precisely processed heat treatment ensuring every blade maintains its strength and function. Rockwell hardness: 56 ± 2 HRC.

Most Comfortable Kitchen Knives: Full tang ergonomic handle provide a comfortable and flexible grip. Increased handle weight improving balance. The design of the handle uses special technology to form ridges that not only increase aesthetics, but also offer better grip.

Value Knife Set: 14-pieces knives set for kitchen includes 8" chef knife, 7" Santoku knife, 8" bread knife, 8" slicing knife, 3.5"paring knife, 5" utility knife, 4.5" serrated steak knife * 6, kitchen shears and knife block. All-in-one knife sets for kitchen with block meets all kinds of needs of your kitchen.

Trustworthy: Designed in California, imarku focuses on developing high-quality knives and is dedicated to enhancing your cooking experience. We promise to cover our knife sets for life. If knives set is defective, we will provide free exchange or return for life. imarku knife set for kitchen with block is the perfect Christmas gifts, also for Weddings and Housewarming.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sharpest knives I’ve ever owned
reviews.reviewText: These knives are so sharp and wash beautifully. Nicest knives I’ve ever owned. The scissors are especially nice, because they’re sharp and strong and wash easily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I’ve had these for a few months and still love them. They are super sharp and cut through anything so be careful! The knive sharpener is a nice touch as well to keep them sharp. My only annoyance with these and truthfully any knives is that when you hand wash them you need to dry immediately otherwise if there is any water on them they will leave a water stain.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This set is excellent for any kitchen. The sharpener is nice to have to ensure blades don’t dull. It works for anything I need. The grips on the knives are really good and help you to make accurate cuts.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very sharp and light
reviews.reviewText: These knives are very nice looking and as expected very sharp out of the box. These are probably the lightest knives I've ever held. Not sure if that's a good thing or not, but thus far they cut through meat like butter. There's an attached sharpener too, so we'll see how much they wear down the more I use them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 18, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very Nice Knife set. Read below for customer Service review and warranty information.
reviews.reviewText: The Knives and butcher block are very nice. Quality stainless steel set that looks wonderful on my granite countertop.But, Three of the steak knives had a minor factory defect a half inch from the tip on the top and the chef knife had a 3” scratch on the left side. Upon opening the knife set I cleaned and dried all knives very carefully with a soft sponge and a soft new towel. These defects were from the factory, there is no warranty information in the packaging or on the Amazon website. Just an email which I’m getting no response from. My rating could potentially change depending if the company reaches out.Edit: adding 1 star to review as the company did reach out the next day. They asked for pictures which I provided and I just now got a response for a resolution. They offered to either replace the four knives with the minor defects or a partial refund which is what I accepted. They stated the defects possibly happened during shipping but that seems impossible because they actually were packaged very well.Once I actually get the partial refund I’ll add 1 more star. I did ask one more time what the actual warranty is because they did not answer that question initially, simply “not to worry and they would help me out however they could”.The Amazon link for the warranty tells you to contact the company, like I said earlier there is nothing referencing warranty in the box.Edit: I just got another email from them stating they “generally provide a lifetime warranty” So that’s good to knowI actually used the steak knives yesterday for dinner and they cut well, I’m still getting used to the serrated aspect since my old set was non-serrated.Edit: I did receive the partial refund a couple days later as promised and the company made good to my satisfaction. I am adding one more star to my review as promised. The knife set continues to impress. I cut onions the other day and the chef knife went through them like butter.Yes, I very well could’ve returned them through Amazon and requested a new set initially but I wanted to see how the company would respond and they did so very well and promptly. I would buy this knife set again in the future and do recommend them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing knife set
reviews.reviewText: I am enamored with this knife set, having utilized it consistently for an entire year. While I don't use it daily, it sees weekly use, and even after a year, the knives remain in exceptional condition—no rust or signs of wear. The wooden box has maintained its original quality since the day of purchase. These knives are not only heavy and durable but also draw compliments from anyone who sees them in my kitchen. Overall, it has been a highly satisfying investment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The block doesn't take up a lot of space. The knives are well made. Beautiful set!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome Knife Set
reviews.reviewText: This set of Knives is Awesome. The Quality of these here knives are Great. Sharp, yes they are, Very Sharp. If ever I need a new set, Imarku is who I'm looking for.

Amazing sharp and light knifes that cut like butter, I've used all the knifes already.. I've used the same one about 10 times already and i haven't had to sharpen it yet.. they have great customer service. My block came in crack, they responded right away with a free replacement block.. would highly recommend this company to anyone.
Coupe très bien et reste affiliéJe le recommande 😉
The knives are sharp with a thinner blade,so nice to slice with. The block and knife set looks great too

To clarify. I am not a chef or even a good cook. It takes me 10 minutes to dice an onion. I have always wanted a good set of knives. Now these are not super expensive or super in expensive. I wanted what I could afford and looked for good reviews. The reviews were spot on. Yes they come razor sharp. Easy to wash, well packaged. Each knife is individually wrapped and protected. The block it comes with was far better than any knife block I have had in the past. It actually is balanced. Great purchase and very happy.
I loved this knife set so much I ordered one for my mom too!!
